import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import AdminSidebar from '../AdminSidebar' export default function Maincategory() { let [data , setData] = useState([]) useEffect(async()=>{ let response = await fetch("http://localhost:8000/maincategory", { method: "GET", headers: { "content-type": "application/json" } }) response = await response.json() if(response) setData(response.slice(1)) else alert("Something Went to Wrong") },[]) return ( <> {/* */}

Admin

  1. Home
  2. Maincategory
{/* */}
Maincategory
{ data.map((item,index)=>{ return }) }
ID Name
{item.id} {item.name}
) }
